application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1. Lombardy Poplar Tree. 23 metres in height. Sever Ivy to 2 metres above ground level. Reduce the tree in height to previous reduction points (taking approximately 4/5 metres off the top) leaving the tree 18 metres in height. T2. Lombardy Poplar. 22 metres in height. Sever Ivy to 2 metres above ground level. Reduce the tree in height to previous reduction points (taking 4/5 metres from the top) leaving the tree 17 metres in height. T3. Sycamore Tree. 8 metres in height. Sectional dismantle and poison tree with eco plugs. T4. Lombardy Tree. 17 metres in height. Reduce branches back to original reduction points ( Approximately 3/4 metres) T5. Walnut Tree. 13 metres in height. Crown Lift to 4 metres above ground level and cut back to closes growth points (approximately 2/3 metres) T6. Sycamore Tree. 19 metres in height. Reduce the height of the tree to previous reduction points (approximately 9.6 metres in height) leaving the tree 9.4 metres in height. T7. Lime Tree. 10 metres in height. Re pollard. T8. Lime Tree. 12 metres in height. Re pollard
decision_conditions: Standard time limit - Trees Con Area
